item.title: OSWE/AWAE Preparation
item.description: OSWE-AWAE-Preparation This post contains all trainings and tutorials that could be useful for offensive security’s OSWE certification. I will be updating the post during my lab and preparation for the exam. Course Syllabus: https://www.offensive-security.com/documentation/awae-syllabus.pdf Before registering for AWAE: Get comfortable with python requests library Read Web Application Hacker’s handbook, again if you already did Get familiar with Burpsuite Get familiar with regex Cross-Site Scripting: XSS XMLHttpRequest Specification Hijack Session using socat XSS and MySQL PentesterLab: XSS and MySQL FILE https://www.
